name: Boar Style
description: Your sharp teeth and nails rip your foes open.
benefit: You can deal bludgeoning damage or slashing damage with your unarmed strikesâ€”changing damage type is a free action. While using this style, once per round when you hit a single foe with two or more unarmed strikes, you can tear flesh. When you do, you deal 2d6 extra points of damage with the attack.
staminaText: While using this style, you can spend 3 stamina points when you hit a target with only one unarmed strike during a round to tear flesh and deal 2d6 points of damage with the attack. You can still only tear flesh once per round.
